channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Car strikes crowd outside Los Angeles venue, injuring 30. Bystanders attack driver, who was shot
item.description: At least three people were in critical condition after being injured along Santa Monica Boulevard in East Hollywood.

item.title: 3 people are still missing from deadly July 4 floods in Texas county, down from nearly 100
New airport scanners are better at spotting liquid explosives, but many airports lack them
